name: Figma’s Trending Most Powerfull Wireframing UI kit Design System (Zara)
description:
UITREND is the largest wireframing UI kit and design system for Figma in the world. Kickstart any project, save thousands of hours, and level up as a designer.


✨ Download full for version for FREE at uitrend.com✨


Save thousands of design hours


  • 500+ Components: Covering the most popular categories.
  • Responsive: Made for mobile specially for figma.
  • 50+ Screens cards: Designing for iOS & Android ? We got you covered!
  • 40+ smart arrows: Using 9-slice scaling Light theme making your flows easy
  • 250+ icons: Numerical and functional.


Gathered, organized and cleaned up all those components into this Figma Wireframing Kit, mostly for my own personal use, but I’m also sharing it with Figma’s Community in the hope it’ll help someone else kickstart their low-fidelity designs.


Features

  • Text Styles
  • Colors
  • Icons
  • Buttons & pills
  • Input Fields & Dropdowns
  • Checkboxes, Radio buttons & Toggles
  • Text tabs & Icon tabs
  • Device frames (iOS, Android & Web)

Download Full Wireframe UI kIt For FREE


If you have any query contact us - uitrend.com@gmail.com


✨ Thankyou Enjoy ✨
